review: More help on the method of using this item is required. Other than sending a "non labeled" black plastic THING? some written instruction would be very helpful. webmark_@msn.com
author: WEB "W.E.Boa"

review: Lots of audio/video sync issues from multiple sources. Lots of people having them so there must not be a fix available. Really rather frustrating to try to watch with this problem. Chromecast does not have this issue.
author: PianoKeysPleezMe

review: So far it's great. I am dumping Cable, I put up an antenna as well
author: maqwjb8

review: I had high hopes for the Fire TV Stick. It's at least as good as the Roku, so I'll give them that. But I just can't seem to get past the basic user experience as compared to the super polished Apple TV interface. The only time I use my Fire stick is when I need to stream from my prime account. If I'm watching Netflix or listening to music, I'm all about the Apple TV.
author: S. Sanchez

review: I am still learning how to find what I like to watch.
author: David

review: Enjoy it very much works great
author: Amazon Customer
